ul.li: Added detailed view to Request URL section (hover URL sign)
Fixed Issue 54 : Auto-complete prevents "enter" on parent path of previous entry
Fixed Issue 55 : Content-Type is set by Default (application/x-www-form-urlencoded), but should not be
Added server request "X-Chrome-Extension" header to prevent eneter some URLs outside extension
Fixed Issue 50 : Cannot remove file from body
Fixed Issue 51 : XML Body has collapse/expand arrows, but they do not work
Fixed Issue 53 : Cannot save Content-Type header
Fixed history ammout
Added option "Clear history"
In "Parsed response" tab "Open output in new window" now paste HTML value into new window (instead of HTML markup text)
Added Google App Engine server to store saved data and share it with coworkers
Speed up code highlighting (I hope :).
Added permission "History" to provide request url suggestions from browser history
Fixed date-type header support (time now sets correctly)
Reorganized database suggest oracle
Improvements in CodeMirror load. Fixed non visible CodeMirror output.
CodeMirror response panel now has clickable links (href and src attributes values).
Added JSON headers definitions in options panel. Now user can define custom JSON headers.
Fixed "Authorization" header support (restore basic params in wizard)
Added shortcuts editor. Now you can define Your own shortcuts for some actions.
Updated CodeMirror to version 2.2
Fixed many headers with same name support
Fixed file transport using headers and raw body (instead of file form) Issue 28
